> [!NOTE]
> **Instructions:**
> 1. Fill in event details below. Do not change formatting (but you can add notes at the bottom in the "Notes" section).
> 2. The title of this issue (textbox above) does not matter; set the "Event Name" field below instead.
> 3. Use Unicode text only (do not use markdown formatting, but emojis are ok).

Event Details
---
### Event Name
One short line only
```
ðŸ˜ƒ ADSV Happy Hour
```

### Event Description
Multiple lines OK
```
Join us for the ADSV happy hour this Friday, hosted by the XXX Lab.
Some more information blah blah blah.
Blah.
```

### Time
Follow format below, summer time will be handled automatically.
For whole-day events (e.g. ski retreat), write dates only (e.g. "FROM 2024-02-15 TO 2024-02-17", inclusive!). For one-day events, set start and end to the same date.
```
FROM 2024-11-30 17:00:00 TO 2024-11-30 21:00:00
```

### Location
```
SV Lobby
```

Notes

Content below will not be included in the published calendar event
